summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of OsteoAI platform completed successfully. All major features tested including login flows, AI assessment journey, results display, doctor finder, chat functionality, and navigation systems. Dark medical-futuristic theme implemented correctly with smooth animations and responsive design.
passed_tests: Login/Register: Both Patient and Doctor demo login flows working
Patient Dashboard: Displays correctly with and without assessment data
AI Assessment: Complete 5-step form flow (Basic Info → Lifestyle → Medical History → Documents → Symptoms)
AI Results: Risk score calculation, T-score display, classification, recommendations working
Doctor Finder: Search functionality, doctor cards display, booking buttons functional
AI Chat: Message sending, AI responses, voice button integration working
My Reports: Assessment history display working
Doctor Dashboard: Stats display, charts rendering correctly
Navigation: Role-based navigation items, language toggle (5 languages), theme toggle working
Animations: Loading screens (3s), processing screens, fadeSlideUp animations, count-up effects all functional
Responsive Design: Mobile viewport (390x844) displays correctly
Data Persistence: Assessment data persisted in localStorage correctly
Error Handling: No critical errors found, graceful fallbacks working
Voice Features: Web Speech API integration with fallback working
success_percentage: Frontend: 100% - All tested features working correctly
